    app = angular.module('app', [ 'ui.router' ]); app.config(function($stateProvider, $urlRouterProvider) { $urlRouterProvider.otherwise("/"); $stateProvider .state('main', { url: "/main", templateUrl: "views/main.html" controller: 'MainCtrl' }) .state('list', { url: "/list", templateUrl: "views/list.html", controller: 'ItemsCtrl' }) }); **Вложенность: **
    (в родительской вьюхе) .state('list.item', { url: "/item/:id", templateUrl: "views/item.html", controller: 'ItemCtrl' }) app.controller('ItemCtrl', function($scope, ItemsFactory, $stateParams) { $scope.item = ItemsFactory.getItem($stateParams.id); }); **Смена через контроллер: **

text:
.insert({})
.insert(n)
**Чтение:**
.find
.findOne({_id: 1})
db.collection.find({field: {$gt: value}}}  // больше которого
db.collection.find({field: {$lt: value}}} // меньше которого

$and

$in - если хотя бы один элемент из массива присутствует
$all - все все элементы из массива присутствуют
**Количество элементов:**
**Курсоры:**
**Сортировка и пропуск:**
db.collection().find().sort || skip || limit

**Обновление, редактирование:**
db.collection.update(selector, doc, options)
**Удаление:**
db.collection.remove(selector)
db.collection(drop)

text:
http://css-live.ru/articles-css/shpargalka-po-shpargalke-po-flexbox.html (супер шпора)
https://scotch.io/tutorials/a-visual-guide-to-css3-flexbox-properties (шпора и генератор внизу страницы)
**Генераторы:
**
https://scotch.io/tutorials/a-visual-guide-to-css3-flexbox-properties (генератор внизу страницы)
http://the-echoplex.net/flexyboxes/
http://bennettfeely.com/flexplorer/
http://css3gen.com/css3-flexbox/
**Примеры:** http://callmenick.com/_development/flexbox-examples/index.html  (сетка, меню, навигация, шаблон)
**Библиотеки**
http://flexboxgrid.com/ (сетка)
**parent **
display: flex;
display: inline-flex;
flex-flow:  <flex-direction> || <flex-wrap>;
justify-content: flex-start; [flex-end] [center] [space-between] [space-around]
align-items: stretch; [flex-start] [flex-end] [center] [baseline]
align-content:  stretch; [flex-start] [flex-end] [center] [space-between] [space-around]
flex-direction: row; [row-reverse]
flex-direction: column; [column-reverse]
flex-wrap: nowrap; [wrap]
**child**
order: 1;
flex:  [ <flex-grow> <flex-shrink>? || <flex-basis> ];
align-self: auto [flex-start] [flex-end] [center] [baseline] [stretch]
flex-grow: 1;
flex-shrink: 0;
flex-basis: 200px; [auto]

<meta name="og:site_name" content="IMDb">
<meta name="og:description" content="A group of U.S. Marines, under command of...">
// Контактная информация

<meta name="og:phone_number" content="650-123-4567">
<meta name="og:fax_number" content="+1-415-123-4567">
// Месторасположение
<meta name="og:latitude" content="37.416343">
<meta name="og:longitude" content="-122.153013">
<meta name="og:street-address" content="1601 S California Ave">
<meta name="og:locality" content="Palo Alto">
<meta name="og:region" content="CA">
<meta name="og:postal-code" content="94304">
<meta name="og:country-name" content="USA">
// Видео

<meta property="og:video:height" content="640">
<meta property="og:video:width" content="385">

<meta property="og:video:type" content="text/html">

text:
3 дня
40 часов
59 минут
#countdown { display:; } .timer_day_text, .timer_hour_text, .timer_min_text { position: absolute; bottom: -20px; width: 100%; text-transform: uppercase; font: 12px 'gill_sansregular'; color: white; left: 0; } var declOfNum = function (number, titles) { var cases = [2, 0, 1, 1, 1, 2]; return titles[ (number % 100 > 4 && number % 100 < 20) ? 2 : cases[(number % 10 < 5) ? number % 10 : 5] ]; } $(document).ready(function () { $('#countdown').countdown({ until: ts, onTick: function (periods) { days = periods[3]; hours = periods[4]; minutes = periods[5]; seconds = periods[6]; $('.timer_day').html((days < 10 ? '' : '') + days); $('.timer_hour').html((hours < 10 ? '0' : '') + hours); $('.timer_min').html((minutes < 10 ? '0' : '') + minutes); $('.timer_sec').html((seconds < 10 ? '0' : '') + seconds); $('.timer_day_text').html(declOfNum(days, ['День', 'Дня', 'Дней'])); $('.timer_hour_text').html(declOfNum(hours, ['Час', 'Часа', 'Часов'])); $('.timer_min_text').html(declOfNum(minutes, ['Минута', 'Минуты', 'Минут'])); $('.timer_sec_text').html(declOfNum(minutes, ['Секунды', 'Секунды', 'Секунд'])); }, tickInterval: 1 }); });

text:
<script>
  var seconds = Math.floor(Date.now() / 1000)
  seconds = Math.floor(seconds / 194400) * 194400;
  var date = new Date();
  date.setTime(seconds*1000);
 
  var hours = date.getHours()+"";
  var minutes = date.getHours()+"";
  var seconds = date.getSeconds()+"";
  var day = date.getDate()+"";
  var year = date.getFullYear()+"";
  var month = date.getMonth()+"";
  if (seconds.length == 1) seconds = "0"+seconds;
  if (minutes.length == 1) minutes = "0"+minutes;
  if (day.length == 1) day = "0"+day;
  if (year.length == 1) year = "0"+year;
  if (month.length == 1) month = "0"+month;
  if (hours.length == 1) hours = "0"+hours;
  var buf = month+"/"+day+"/"+year+","+hours+":"+seconds; 
  ts = new Date(buf);
</script>

text:
<?php header('Access-Control-Allow-Origin: *'); 
$url = "http://" . $_SERVER['HTTP_HOST'] . $_SERVER['REQUEST_URI'];
$vk_request = file_get_contents('http://vk.com/share.php?act=count&index=1&url='.$url);
$temp = array();
preg_match('/^VK.Share.count\(1, (\d+)\);$/i',$vk_request,$temp);
$vk_like = $temp[1];
$facebook_request = file_get_contents('http://graph.facebook.com/'.$url);
$fb = json_decode($facebook_request);
$vb_c = 0;
if(property_exists($fb,'shares'))
$fb_like =$fb->shares;
$twitter_request = file_get_contents('http://urls.api.twitter.com/1/urls/count.json?url='.$url);
$twitter = json_decode($twitter_request);
$t_like = $twitter->count;
global $likes;
$likes = $fb_like+$vk_like+$t_like;
?>

text: $('.flexslider').flexslider({ animation: "slide", animationLoop: false }); .flex-control-nav { display: ; } .flex-direction-nav { .flex-next { background: url('../img/how/right.png') left top no-repeat; position: absolute; right: 0; background-size: cover; width: 39px; height: 122px; color: transparent; text-indent: -10000px; top: 290px; cursor: pointer; } .flex-prev { background: url('../img/how/left.png') left top no-repeat; position: absolute; color: transparent; text-indent: -10000px; top: 290px; left: 0; background-size: cover; width: 39px; height: 122px; cursor: pointer; } }

text:

Программа 5
.select { background: url('../img/select.png') center center no-repeat; background-size: cover; width: 435px; height: 44px; text-align: left; span { line-height: 44px; padding-left: 30px; font-family: "DIN Next CYR"; font-size: 20px; color: rgb( 0, 0, 0 ); } } .select-list { width: 435px; @include border-radius(4px); border: 2px solid #c69d55; position: absolute; margin-top: -44px; z-index: 10; display: ; div { padding-top: 10px; padding-bottom: 10px; padding-left: 30px; width: 405px; cursor: pointer; background: white; &:hover { background: #f6f6f6; } } } var listbox = function() { $(function() { $('.select').on('click', function(e) { var ind = $('.select').index(this); $('.select-list').fadeOut(400).eq(ind).stop().fadeIn(400); e.stopPropagation(); }); $('.select-list div').on('click', function() { $(this).closest('.select-con').find('input').val($(this).html()); $(this).closest('.select-con').find('.select span').html($(this).html()); }); $('.body_wrapper').on('click', function() { $('.select-list').fadeOut(400); }); }); $('.select-con').each(function() { var c = $(this).find('.select-list div:eq(0)').html(); $(this).find('input').val(c); $(this).find('.select span').html(c); }); }
